metadata.title: CVE-2023-1382 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A data race flaw was found in the Linux kernel, between where con isallocated and con->sock is set. This issue leads to a NULL pointerdereference when accessing con->sock->sk in net/tipc/topsrv.c in the tipcprotocol in the Linux kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
